extendedInfo.description: CheapFlightsSearch's specialty is finding the best connections, ones that other flight searches won't show you. Our flight planner shows you the best connections, but again you can limit these by using the filters. You can eliminate ground travel, reduce the maximum number of stops and disallow overnight flights. You may be cutting out the cheapest flight by doing this, but instead you might find the one best suited to you. Direct flight are the most tempting, since you eliminate a lot of hassle, but they are often not the cheapest flight available. For the cheapest prices, look for low cost airlines, and especially connections with at least one low-cost airline.  And using CheapFlights-Search.com's flight search saves you the time and hassle of searching for available flights on each of the airlines sites individually.Added Flights Status Link so you can see Flight Status by Flight, Departures & Arrivals, Flight Status by Route and many other options in real time!Try it Now!

reviews.comment: Works ok but not designed for larger sized phones eg HTC Sensation
